{"id":298996589,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 7 months","timestamp":1580469258,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/298996589/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"8 MB","code":"class Solution {\nint next(int n){\n    int sum = 0;\n    while (n > 0){\n        int d  = n % 10;\n        n /= 10;\n        sum += d*d;\n    }\n    return sum;\n}\n    \n    \n    public:\n     bool isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = n;\n        int fast = n;\n        while(true){\n            slow = next(slow);\n            fast = next(next(fast));\n            if (fast == 1) return true;\n            if (slow == fast) return false;\n        }\n         \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
